review: It was really a nice experience...all the doctors are very good..very cooperative..deal with the child very well...

review: Great doctor. Very friendly and answers every question very clearly. Got my braces done with him. Very good experience.

review: I liked doctor Amit and his team. Very capable, quick on foot service. I got immediate medication for my toothache and it provided instant relief. Will revisit if any dental problems happen.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: I liked his openness to my questions and his readiness to patiently answer them after he fully explained possible options for my problem.

Very good work by a lovely mannered dental surgeon. A friendly, helpful group of staff who are always polite, courteous, and helpful.
Excellent service as usual from professional staff. 
Would highly recommend!
